channel.title: Let's Get Chaotic on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Let's Get Chaotic on Chaotic Online

item.title: Welcome to Chaotic (Part 1)
item.description: In the first episode of the series, the protagonist, Tom Majors, receives his access code for Chaotic, a place where, according to his best friend, Kaz, you can turn into the Creatures and play for real.

item.title: Welcome to Chaotic (Part 2)
item.description: In continuation of the series, after entering his access code, the protagonist, Tom Majors, discovers that all the fantasies of his friend’s, Kaz, were real and has his first battle in Chaotic

item.title: Unexpected
item.description: In this episode we meet the fourth member of the group, Peyton, and his… “eccentric”, personality.

item.title: Over Under Rent Asunder
item.description: The ancient war between Good versus Evil in the Chaotic universe: OverWorld vs. UnderWorld.

item.title: Crash Course
item.description: In this episode, Kaz faces Klay in a dispute while Tom tries to get the scan of a lunatic Creature whose life is playing tricks.

item.title: The Thing About Bodal
item.description: In this episode we meet Bodal, a Creature (very) talkative and adorably annoying and cocky about himself, and also see the most improbable of all fights in Chaotic.

item.title: Buggin' Out
item.description: In this episode we’ll know another of the four Tribes in Chaotic, the Danians, a Tribe formed by insects of all kinds that take the safety of their domains seriously, especially when it comes to Chaotic players.

item.title: Everything's in Flux
item.description: In this episode we’ll know a little more about Krystella, a player as unprincipled as Klay that does everything, no matter what, to succeed or to prevent those who cross her path to succeed themselves.

item.title:
Castle Bodhran or Bust
(Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet the story of Reginald Terrington, the problems in which he got himself and the friends group’s attempt to rescue him with a bet that could mean the end of career in Chaotic of one of them.

item.title:
Castle Bodhran or Bust
(Part 2)
item.description: In the continuation of the previous episode, the protagonist, Tom Majors, comes face-to-face with his hero, but before he could even try to rescue Reggie, he must not only gain his trust, but also fight a real battle against another Tribe along with his friends.

item.title: Lord of Treachery
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet the treacherous Lord Van Bloot, second in command of the Underworld, and how Chaor makes of Kaz his spy and uses the Chaotic battles as a military strategy against him

item.title: Battledrome of the Sexes
item.description: In this espisódio we’ll discover (or not) who plays Chaotic better, men or women, boys or girls, in a fight between Peyton and Krystella.

item.title: Battle Lesson
item.description: In this episode, the protagonist, Tom Majors, finds out about the main event in Chaotic: The CodeMasters Matches!

item.title: The Birth of Borth-Majar
item.description: In this episode we will know the origins of an unusual creature, Borth-Majar, and how Kaz deals with his collective individually personality (what? O.o)

item.title: Shifting Sands
item.description: In this episode Peyton shows to Tom that not all of the Mipedians are cruel and pitiless as those he met while rescuing Reggie.

item.title: Fallen Hero
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a treacherous coup of Lord Van Bloot against Maxxor that could destroy the Otherworld.

item.title: Scavenger Scan
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz and Peyton competing with each other (again) to see who is the best player of Chaotic between them.

item.title: Allmageddon
item.description: In this episode we’ll know the story of Hoton, a Creature that, seeking for an ancient power to protect everything and everyone he loved, ended up losing everything.

item.title: A Fearsome Fate
item.description: In the previous episodes, the protagonist, Tom Majors, finally got a new scan of his favorite Creature, Maxxor, but when he used it for the first time in battle he realizes that something is wrong.

item.title: Maze of Menace
item.description: In this episode, continuing the sequence in which the Commander of the Otherworld, Maxxor, was ambushed by Lord Van Bloot’s treacherous Mugic, we’ll see a partnership between Creatures and humans to restore the Fallen Hero before it’s too late.

item.title: Out in the Cold
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz’s journey through a dangerous path, with an unusual guidance, to the aid of the reclusive Raimusa in the Crystal Range.

item.title: Chaotikings
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz’s initiation in the most famous “club” in chaotic… or not.

item.title: Stelgar Strikes
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Mommark, a mad scientist from the OverWorld, and one of his creations, Stelgar.

item.title: The CodeMaster Chronicles (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the first part of the most amazing match in Chaotic: The battle between Tom Majors and the CodeMaster Crellan!

item.title: The CodeMaster Chronicles (Part 2)
item.description: In continuation of the previous episode we’ll see the outcome of the epic battle. So epic that have almost no time for a proper prologue ^_^

item.title: The Ultimate Scan
item.description: In this episode we’ll know a bit about a mythical Creature called Iparu and its fantastic abilities.

item.title: An Easy Win
item.description: In this episode we’ll see how things can get really ugly when we try to take advantage of a rookie, right Peyton? ^_^

item.title: A Flux Too Far
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz and Peyton trying to get a scan of the Flux Bauble (or not).

item.title: Chaotic Crisis
item.description: In this episode, the Creatures of Chaotic invade Earth! Let’s get Chaotic… for our planet!

item.title: The Curse of Kor-Bek
item.description: In this episode, set in the archipelago in which Peyton and Kaz ended up in the episode “A Flux Too Far”, we’ll have pirates, buried treasures, curses and chasing. Can it get better? ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

item.title: Fire Fighters
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a hot fight, literally, in which both players will try to prove their own superiority as well as of one of of the Four Elements.

item.title: Chasm Quest
item.description: In this episode Tom finally decides to explore the Prexxor Chasm, in Perim, from the scan he got from CodeMaster Crellan, until he realizes that something is really wrong.

item.title: Train Wreck
item.description: In this episode, when Kaz starts getting trouble in chaotic, Peyton helps him with a… not very conventional personal trainer.

item.title: Trading Cards
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a card trading chain engineered by Sarah so she could have the scan of rare Mugic. Of course our gentlemen wouldn’t let her down… right?

item.title: Dual Duel (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Krystella and Klay up to no good (again), resulting in a interesting dual battle for the scan of a wicked Battlegear.

item.title: Dual Duel (Part 2)
item.description: In the continuation of the previous episode we’ll not only see the ending of the battle in midst of Krystella and Klay’s mental games but we’ll see as well that… well… karma is a bitch ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

item.title: Going Under
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a small part of one of the most known teachings of Sun Tzu’s The Art of War in Chaotic: Know your enemy!

item.title: Big Time
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Sarah’s quest to get the scan of a rare and powerful winged Danian that ends up on her frustrating a kidnapping attempt by an enemy Tribe

item.title: Eye of the Maelstrom
item.description: In this episode, Tom and his friends will help Najarin and a group of Mipedians in a important mission and that trust is a gift, not a right

item.title:
Fighting Friendly
(Season Finale)
item.description: In this episode… the end! Of the season, of a promising career and of a long time friendship…
